Title: Bugsy
Production_Co: TriStar Pictures, Mulholland Productions, Baltimore Pictures
Cast: Warren Beatty, Annette Bening, Harvey Keitel, Ben Kingsley, Elliott Gould, Joe Mantegna, Richard C. Sarafian, Bebe Neuwirth, Gian-Carlo Scandiuzzi, Wendy Phillips, Stefanie Mason, Kimberly McCullough, Andy Romano, Robert Beltran, Bill Graham
Plot: The story of how Bugsy Siegel started Las Vegas. New York gangster Ben 'Bugsy' Siegel takes a brief business trip to Los Angeles. A sharp-dressing womaniser with a foul temper, Siegel doesn't hesitate to kill or maim anyone crossing him. In L.A. the life, the movies, and most of all strong-willed Virginia Hill detain him while his family wait back home. Then a trip to a run-down gambling joint at a spot in the desert known as Las Vegas gives him his big idea. Written by Jeremy Perkins {J-26}
Keywords: gambling, temper, gangster, true crime, barking
Location: Indoor Pool, Biltmore Hotel - 506 S. Grand Avenue, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
Actors: Warren Beatty, Annette Bening, Harvey Keitel
Description: Directed by Barry Levinson.  With Warren Beatty, Annette Bening, Harvey Keitel, Ben Kingsley. The story of how Bugsy Siegel started Las Vegas.
